claim: Back to the Future Part II was produced by Robert Zemeckis.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Robert Lee Zemeckis  (  born May 14 , 1952  )  is an American filmmaker and screenwriter frequently credited as an innovator in visual effects .

claim: Back to the Future Part II was produced by Robert Zemeckis.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Credited as `` one of the greatest visual storytellers in filmmaking '' , he first came to public attention in the 1980s as the director of Romancing the Stone  (  1984  )  and the science-fiction comedy Back to the Future film trilogy , as well as the live-action/animated comedy Who Framed Roger Rabbit  (  1988  )  .

claim: Back to the Future Part II was produced by Robert Zemeckis.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In the 1990s he diversified into more dramatic fare , including 1994 's Forrest Gump , for which he won an Academy Award for Best Director .

claim: Back to the Future Part II was produced by Robert Zemeckis.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The film itself won Best Picture .

claim: Back to the Future Part II was produced by Robert Zemeckis.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The movies he has directed have ranged across a wide variety of genres , for both adults and families .

claim: Back to the Future Part II was produced by Robert Zemeckis.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Zemeckis ' films are characterized by an interest in state-of-the-art special effects , including the early use of the insertion of computer graphics into live-action footage in Back to the Future Part II  (  1989  )  , and in Forrest Gump and the pioneering performance capture techniques seen in The Polar Express  (  2004  )  , Beowulf  (  2007  )  and A Christmas Carol  (  2009  )  .

claim: Back to the Future Part II was produced by Robert Zemeckis.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Though Zemeckis has often been pigeonholed as a director interested only in effects , his work has been defended by several critics , including David Thomson , who wrote that `` No other contemporary director has used special effects to more dramatic and narrative purpose . ''

claim: Back to the Future Part II was produced by Robert Zemeckis.
premise_source_doc_sentence: On April 27 , 2017 , Screen Junkies reported Zemeckis was in talks to direct a movie based on The Flash for the DC Extended Universe .

claim: Back to the Future Part II was produced by Robert Zemeckis.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Back to the Future Part II is a 1989 American science-fiction adventure comedy film directed by Robert Zemeckis and written by Bob Gale .

claim: Back to the Future Part II was produced by Robert Zemeckis.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Executive produced by Robert Zemeckis and Steven Spielberg , this is the first time since Back to the Future Part III that they have worked together .

claim: Back to the Future Part II was produced by Robert Zemeckis.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Back to the Future Part III was filmed in California and Arizona , and was produced on a $ 40 million budget back-to-back with Part II .

claim: Back to the Future Part II was produced by Robert Zemeckis.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The film marked the beginning of a franchise , with two sequels , Back to the Future Part II  (  1989  )  and Back to the Future Part III  (  1990  )  , as well as an animated series , theme park ride , several video games and a forthcoming musical .
